equipment: 13 mm syringe filter (0.45 μm PTFE membrane)
synthesis_conditions.procedure: DEF added to flask containing Zn(NO3)2•6H2O and benzene-1,4-dicarboxylic acid, stirred until solids dissolved. Solution filtered into vials, sealed, heated at 85 °C for 72 h, cooled to room temperature for 24 h. Crystals washed three times with fresh DMF.
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed three times with fresh DMF
synthesis_conditions.yield: Large cube-shaped crystals (between 1×1×1 mm and 3×3×2 mm)

synthesis_conditions.procedure: (i) FA and BADE dissolved in DMF, heated at 90 °C for two days. (ii) MBI added to crude FA-BADE oligomer solution, shaken, left at room temperature for 3 days for gelation. (iii) Mixture cast against silicon wafer, after gelation, organogel layer peeled off and cut into blocks.
